description.value:
You carefully take aim before making your attack in order to avoid your foe's concealment and cover.

On your next @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Strike]{Strike} with a thrown weapon before the end of your turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll and ignore your target's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} condition, as well as the target's lesser cover or standard cover; if the target had greater cover, they instead have only standard cover against the Strike.
